data.title: Capability Consulting
data.meta_description: Capability Consulting is a bespoke executive search service. Our Hiring for Growth approach has a 99% success rate (a full year after the placement)
data.text:
We make executive

search personal

Dedicated to helping you and your business grow through bespoke executive search.

Our Founder

Oliver Parker is author of The Capability Crisis. He began his recruiting career in 1997 covering senior finance appointments and developed his role as Executive Search Specialist in 2004. He’s been handling hard-to-fill C-suite, Director and Senior Management roles across core business functions ever since.

Download your complimentary copy of Oliver’s book now.

DOWNLOAD MY FREE BOOK (PDF)

What our clients say

AFTER HIRING A DIVISIONAL MD

“I’d 100% recommend Capability Consulting to others. The candidate he put forward has been a revelation and the motivational maps he presented at an internal meeting has proved really valuable to our business. We often refer back to them.”

Rich Keith, CEO

Why wait?

Take the risk out of hiring the right leader to achieve operational excellence in your organisation.

12-month guarantee on placements

Hire for Growth with Capability Consulting’s expert recruitment services. Getting started only takes a few clicks.
